mapper.select: SELECT A.CAREER_CODE_PK , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.COMPANY_NAME , A.NAME_IS_OPENED , A.RSM_POSITION , A.RSM_STATUS , A.TASK , A.ETC , A.CERTIFICATE , A.RESUME_CODE_FK FROM TBL_RSM_CAREER A WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_FK = #{resumeCode}

SELECT A.EDUCATION_CODE_PK , A.DIVISION , A.SCHOOL_NAME , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.MAJOR , A.STATUS , A.RESUME_CODE_FK , A.TOTAL_SCORE , A.RECORDED_SCORE FROM TBL_RSM_EDUCATION A WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_FK = #{resumeCode}
SELECT A.CERTIFICATE_CODE_PK , A.INSTITUTION , A.ACQUISITION_DATE , A.RESUME_CODE_FK , A.CERTIFICATE_DIV_CODE_FK FROM TBL_RSM_CERTIFICATE A WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_FK = #{resumeCode}
SELECT A.TRAINING_CODE_PK , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.INSTITUTION , A.COURSE , A.CONTENT , A.RESUME_CODE_FK FROM TBL_RSM_JOB_TRAINING A WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_FK = #{resumeCode}

SELECT A.ABILITY_CODE_PK , A.GRADE , A.EXAMINATION_DATE , A.RESUME_CODE_FK , A.TEST_CODE_FK , B.TEST_NAME FROM TBL_RSM_FOREIGN_LANGUAGE_ABILITY A JOIN TBL_RSM_FOREIGN_LANGUAGE_TEST B ON(B.TEST_CODE_PK = A.TEST_CODE_FK) WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_FK = #{resumeCode}
SELECT A.EXP_CODE_PK , A.DIVISION , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.NATION , A.INSTITUTION , A.CONTENT , A.RESUME_CODE_FK FROM TBL_RSM_OVERSEAS_EXPERIENCE A WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_FK = #{resumeCode}
SELECT B.TECH_DIV_CODE_PK , B.TECH_VALUE FROM TBL_RSM_CHOSE_TECH A JOIN TBL_RSM_TECH_DIV B ON(A.TECH_DIV_CODE_PK_FK = B.TECH_DIV_CODE_PK) WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_PK_FK = #{resumeCode}
SELECT B.POS_DIV_CODE_PK , B.RSM_VALUE FROM TBL_RSM_CHOSE_POSITION A JOIN TBL_RSM_POSITION_DIV B ON(A.POS_DIV_CODE_PK_FK = B.POS_DIV_CODE_PK) WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_PK_FK = #{resumeCode}

SELECT A.ACTIVITY_CODE_PK , A.DIVISION , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.INSTITUTION_NAME , A.ACTIVITY_NAME , A.CORE_ACTIVITY , A.RESUME_CODE_FK FROM TBL_RSM_ACTIVITIES A WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_FK = #{resumeCode}
SELECT * FROM TBL_RSM_RESUME A WHERE A.RESUME_CODE_PK = #{resumeCode} AND A.IS_ACTIVATED = 'Y'
SELECT TECH_DIV_CODE_PK , TECH_VALUE FROM TBL_RSM_TECH_DIV ORDER BY TECH_VALUE
SELECT POS_DIV_CODE_PK , RSM_VALUE FROM TBL_RSM_POSITION_DIV ORDER BY RSM_VALUE
SELECT TEST_CODE_PK , FOREIGN_LANGUAGE , TEST_NAME FROM TBL_RSM_FOREIGN_LANGUAGE_TEST ORDER BY TEST_NAME
SELECT CERTIFICATE_DIV_CODE_PK , CERTIFICATE_TYPE , CERTIFICATE_NAME FROM TBL_RSM_CERTIFICATE_DIV
SELECT RESUME_CODE_PK , TITLE FROM TBL_RSM_RESUME WHERE MEMBER_CODE_FK = #{memberCode} AND IS_ACTIVATED = 'Y' ORDER BY TITLE
